title: Ep 156 | Ted Cruz Is Unashamed, Amy Coney Barrett Attacked for Adoptions & Phil's 2020 Prediction
description:
Sen. Ted Cruz makes his "Unashamed" debut to talk about the Supreme Court, the radical left's hatred for people of faith, and how he saw the redeeming power of salvation when his dad became a believer and reunited their family. Cruz also talks about his timely new book, "One Vote Away: How a Single Supreme Court Seat Can Change History," and his podcast, "Verdict with Ted Cruz." Phil, Jase, and Al discuss the vicious attacks on SCOTUS nominee Amy Coney Barrett for adopting children from Haiti and for being a woman of faith. Al notes the power of Cruz's beard. Phil makes his 2020 election prediction with one caveat. And the guys reminisce about their awesome hunt with the senator.
